statements: SELECT * FROM hospital_reports
SELECT hospital_name, num_patients FROM hospital_reports
SELECT hospital_name, avg_patient_stay_duration FROM hospital_reports WHERE num_patients > 50
SELECT hospital_name FROM hospital_reports WHERE num_doctors < 10 ORDER BY hospital_name DESC
SELECT * FROM hospital_reports WHERE avg_patient_stay_duration <= 7
SELECT * FROM hospital_reports WHERE hospital_id = 1
SELECT hospital_name, num_patients FROM hospital_reports WHERE num_doctors > 5 ORDER BY hospital_name DESC
SELECT hospital_name, num_doctors, avg_patient_stay_duration FROM hospital_reports WHERE num_patients > 100 ORDER BY avg_patient_stay_duration ASC
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name, num_doctors, avg_patient_stay_duration FROM hospital_reports WHERE hospital_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT COUNT(hospital_id) AS total_hospitals, AVG(num_patients) AS avg_patients FROM hospital_reports
SELECT * FROM HospitalResourceUtilization
SELECT hospital_id, resource_type FROM HospitalResourceUtilization
SELECT utilization_rate, date_created FROM HospitalResourceUtilization
SELECT * FROM PatientFlowOptimization
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, department FROM PatientFlowOptimization
SELECT hospital_id, resource_type, utilization_rate, date_created FROM HospitalResourceUtilization WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT hospital_id, resource_type, utilization_rate FROM HospitalResourceUtilization WHERE hospital_id = 5 AND utilization_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY hospital_id;
SELECT department, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM PatientFlowOptimization GROUP BY department;
SELECT department, AVG(DATEDIFF(discharge_date, admission_date)) AS avg_length_of_stay FROM PatientFlowOptimization GROUP BY department;
SELECT DISTINCT attending_physician, department FROM PatientFlowOptimization ORDER BY attending_physician ASC, department DESC;
SELECT * FROM hospital_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM hospital_resources;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patient_records;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM hospital_resources;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patient_records WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hospital_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Equipment' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patient_records WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, resource_name, flow_date FROM patient_records JOIN patient_flow ON patient_records.patient_id = patient_flow.patient_id ORDER BY flow_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, generated_date FROM reports WHERE generated_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY generated_date DESC;

SELECT pr.patient_name, hf.flow_date, r.report_name FROM patient_records pr JOIN patient_flow hf ON pr.patient_id = hf.patient_id JOIN reports r ON hf.flow_id = r.report_id WHERE r.generated_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY hf.flow_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospital WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT department_id, name FROM Department WHERE hospital_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, name FROM Patient WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_id, name FROM Doctor WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT name, location FROM Hospital WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Department ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, count(*) as num_doctors FROM Department JOIN Doctor ON Department.department_id = Doctor.department_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT p.name as patient_name, d.name as doctor_name, h.name as hospital_name FROM Patient p JOIN Doctor d ON p.doctor_id = d.doctor_id JOIN Hospital h ON p.hospital_id = h.hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location, capacity FROM Hospital ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctor WHERE experience > 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Appointment WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM Hospital
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, experience FROM Doctor ORDER BY experience DESC
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointment WHERE status='scheduled'
SELECT patient_name, age, admission_date FROM Patient WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY admission_date ASC
SELECT hospital_name, location, capacity, rating FROM Hospital WHERE rating >= 4.5
